1.description: Traumatized symbol of the rebellion in District 13.
President of District 13, ruthless rebel leader.

3.description: Coin's right-hand man who protects Katniss.

6.description: Director of rebel propos from the Capitol.

1.description: Captured by the Capitol after the Quarter Quell. Katniss desperately wants to save him.

10.description: Rescued from the Capitol but has been hijacked - his memories altered to make him fear and hate Katniss.

18.description: Slowly recovering from hijacking with therapy. Still struggles with what's real.

1.description: Katniss's hunting partner and childhood friend, now a soldier in District 13.

8.description: Becoming more militaristic and focused on winning the war. Helps design weapons and traps.

1.description: Former tribute from District 4, now part of the rebellion in District 13.

7.description: Reveals dark secrets about President Snow's control over victors, including himself.

10.description: Rescued from the Capitol along with Peeta. Was captured and tortured.

14.description: Recovering from torture but still traumatized. Has difficulty with water due to her torture.

1.description: Katniss and Peeta's former mentor, now in District 13 as part of the rebellion.

5.description: Helps plan rescue missions and provides strategic advice to the rebellion.

1.description: Katniss's younger sister, now safe in District 13 after being evacuated from District 12.

8.description: Training to become a medic in District 13, following her calling to heal people.

1.description: The tyrannical president of Panem, now fighting against the rebellion.

7.description: His control over the Capitol and the districts is weakening as the rebellion gains strength.

1.description: Former Head Gamemaker who defected to the rebellion, now helping plan the war against the Capitol.

6.description: Orchestrates propaganda efforts including Katniss's propos to inspire the districts.

1.description: Victor from District 3, now the chief technology specialist for the rebellion.

8.description: Designs weapons and technology for the rebellion, including bombs and tactical equipment.

10.description: Victor from District 4 and Finnick's love interest, rescued from the Capitol.

15.description: Marries Finnick in a ceremony in District 13, bringing some joy during dark times.

8.description: Military leader from District 8, fighting against the Capitol forces.

20.description: One of the key military leaders in the assault on the Capitol.

18.description: Former Avox and camera assistant to Cressida, his tongue was cut out by the Capitol.

20.description: Guides the squad through the Capitol sewers using his knowledge from working as an Avox.

18.description: Camera operator working with Cressida's film crew, Pollux's brother.
Second-in-command of the Star Squad, a disciplined soldier from District 13.

20.description: Takes command of the squad after Boggs is injured, follows orders to protect Katniss.

18.description: One of two sisters in the Star Squad, both skilled soldiers from District 13.
Sister to Leeg 1, part of the Star Squad assigned to protect Katniss in the Capitol.
Young soldier from District 13, part of the Star Squad mission in the Capitol.
Soldier from District 13, member of the Star Squad sent to the Capitol.

12.description: Peeta's childhood friend from District 12, now helping with his recovery from hijacking.

1.description: Katniss and Prim's mother, a healer now working as a medic in District 13.

8.description: Training Prim in medical skills, helping care for the wounded in District 13.

15.description: Former escort for District 12 tributes, now in District 13 as a refugee from the Capitol.

24.description: Helps Katniss prepare for important events, maintains her Capitol mannerisms despite everything.

11.description: Head doctor in District 13, specializes in treating mental trauma and hijacking.

18.description: Continues treating Peeta's hijacking and helps other traumatized tributes.
Member of Cressida's camera crew, former Capitol citizen who defected to the rebellion.

22.description: Former stylist who helps hide Katniss and her squad in the Capitol. Has been surgically altered to look like a tiger.

1.description: Prim's cat, rescued from District 12 and brought to District 13.

10.description: Victor from District 2 with sharpened teeth, was captured but not hijacked.

27.description: Soup vendor from District 12 who returns to help rebuild after the war.

17.description: Former victor from District 2, now a rebel commander helping lead the assault on the Capitol.

1.description: The hybrid bird that became the symbol of the rebellion, combining mockingbird and jabberjay.

6.description: Plutarch's assistant, helps coordinate the propaganda campaign and propo production.

5.description: One of Katniss's former prep team members, now imprisoned in District 13.
Member of Katniss's prep team, imprisoned in District 13 for Capitol connections.
Third member of Katniss's prep team, also imprisoned in District 13.
